decks.notes: The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to apply early pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester. Utilizing cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord to maintain board presence and generate value. The deck also aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and removal spells like Fatal Push. The mana base is built to support a fast and consistent curve, allowing for quick wins through the synergy of its creatures and spells.
